item.title: Airlines reroute, cancel flights as tensions ramp up over Iran - Reuters
item.description: Airlines reroute, cancel flights as tensions ramp up over Iran ReutersAir France resumes service to Dubai, KLM suspends Middle East flights as US forces head to Gulf France 24Slew of international airlines canceling flights to Middle East destinations including Israel amid Iran tensions i24news.tvIran trouble: IndiGo cancels some flights; Air India stops Iran overflying on Europe flights Times of IndiaAir France joins KLM in canceling weekend flights t…
